org.epics.pvmanager.pva.rpcservice.rpcclient

Interface PoolStatistics


  • public interface PoolStatistics
    Interface describing RPCClientPool statistics

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getActive()
      Returns the number of rpc clients that are in use
      String getChannelName()
      Get pool's rpc client name
      String getHostName()
      Get pool's host name
      int getIdle()
      Returns the number of idle rpc clients
      String getName()
      Returns the name of this pool
      PoolConfiguration getPoolProperties()
      Returns the pool properties associated with this rpc client pool
      int getSize()
      Returns the total size of this pool, this includes both busy and idle rpc clients
      int getWaitCount()
      Return the number of threads waiting for a rpc client
      boolean isClosed()
      Returns true if close has been called, and the rpc client pool is unusable

    • Method Detail

        Returns the name of this pool

        String - the name of the pool

        Return the number of threads waiting for a rpc client

        number of threads waiting for a rpc client

      • getPoolProperties

        PoolConfiguration getPoolProperties()
        Returns the pool properties associated with this rpc client pool
        Returns:
        PoolProperties

      • getSize

        int getSize()
        Returns the total size of this pool, this includes both busy and idle rpc clients
        Returns:
        int - number of established rpc clients

      • getActive

        int getActive()
        Returns the number of rpc clients that are in use
        Returns:
        int - number of established rpc clients that are being used by the application

      • getIdle

        int getIdle()
        Returns the number of idle rpc clients
        Returns:
        int - number of established rpc clients not being used

      • isClosed

        boolean isClosed()
        Returns true if close has been called, and the rpc client pool is unusable
        Returns:
        boolean
